text: aur jo kyakti, isake pashchaat bhee maargadarshan khulakar usake saamane aa gaya hai, rasool ka virodh karega aur eemaanavaalon ke maarg ke atirikt kisee aur maarg par chalega to use ham usee par chalane denge, jisako usane apanaaya hoga aur use jahannam mein jhonk denge, aur vah bahut hee bura thikaana hai
